page.title: 16VILLAGE CARE
page.content: The Council discussed the sad condition of the bus shelter in Ivy Lane;it was agreed that that this should be removed.The Council were aware that the shelter had become a meeting place for many of the yonger members of the community,some of whom had nowhere else to go for socialising.It was felt that there was inadequate provision within the village for those young people who wished to meet during the evening not necessarily with adult supervision. The council agreed that the problem of accommodation for young people should be examined in greater detail and that the approprite bodies and individuals shoud be consulted.
